title: 75/19. Credentials of representatives to the seventy-fifth session of the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/75/19 
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
7 December 2020 
 
20-16358 (E)    101220   
*2016358* 
 
 
Seventy-fifth session 
Agenda item 3 (b) 
Credentials of representatives to the seventy-fifth session of 
the General Assembly: report of the Credentials Committee 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 1 December 2020 
 
 
 
 
[without reference to a Main Committee (A/75/606)] 
 
 
 
75/19. Credentials of representatives to the seventy-fifth session 
of the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Having considered the report of the Credentials Committee and the 
recommendation contained therein, 
 
Approves the report of the Credentials Committee.1  
 
33rd plenary meeting 
1 December 2020 
 
__________________ 
 
1  A/75/606.
